buf.validate.conformance.harness.ResultO.description:
ResultOptions are the options passed to the test runner to configure the
 test run.

caseFilter.description: The case filter is a regex that matches against the case name.

strictError.description: If the distinction between runtime and compile time errors must be exact.

strictMessage.description: If the violation message must be an exact match.

suiteFilter.description: The suite filter is a regex that matches against the suite name.

verbose.description: If the test runner should print verbose output.

buf.validate.conformance.harness.ResultO.title: Result Options
